resources.string: Our team hopes that the development of mobile applications will make working and more convenient and more efficient, and solve the problem of information asymmetry and security.

As a platform for matchmakers and students, our logo is a bee and a hive, representing the relationship between the student and the owner. The bees symbolize that students can still maintain the spirit of diligence, self-discipline and teamwork when they change accommodation. The hexagonal hive symbolizes that the home is like the second home of the students. The name of a Shun Shun is derived from our expectation of a change of accommodation. Everyone cares for each other like a family, and cooperates smoothly and smoothly.
Please describe as much as possible the problems and conditions encountered, the relevant staff will deal with as soon as possible! Thank you for your cooperation and assistance!
